Nov. 22, 1930 D Scottish Championship (Fourth Section)
Scottish Championship (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Scottish Championship scottish-championship-fourth-section National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final)
Scotland
Fourth
Gems of Old England
Portobello Town Hall, Portobello, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK 15 bands played.
1st prize £8 and Hawkes Challenge Shield. 2nd prize £4 and shield.
Best euphonium Bannockburn. Best trombone St Lawrence. Best soprano, horn and cornet Coalburn and District.
